name: Boomerang Outlaw
description:
Boomerang Outlaw involves roguelike and action gameplay where you will get the experience of being a boomerang master. You will enter a train with seemingly endless rooms containing phantom bandits within each room. These bandits can only be defeated by your boomerang that ricochets off walls, objects and even the bandits themselves. As they are phantoms, you’ll have to stun them first before following up with another finishing blow.

You will further refine your mastery of the boomerang as you reclaim stolen treasures from the bandits in the form of upgrades. These upgrades add a twist to your playstyle but try not to die or you will lose all your progress and start all over again. Keep going and you will eventually reach the final challenge in this cursed train.
